trans-unit.source: Side-By-Side Module Versioning Support for DSC Resources
trans-unit.target: 对 DSC 资源的并行模块版本控制支持

trans-unit.source: Modules containing DSC resources can be installed side-by-side, and DSC configurations can use a specific version of the resource that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 可以并行安装包含 DSC 资源的模块，并且 DSC 配置可以使用系统上所安装资源的特定版本。

trans-unit.source: In this release, the following are known issues of side-by-side installation:
trans-unit.target: 在此版本中，下列是并行安装的已知问题：

trans-unit.source: Using two different versions of the DSC resource within the same configuration is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持在同一配置内使用 DSC 资源的两个不同版本。
